title: welcome newman

replies.txt_content:
Welcome to MCBBS, I hope you can pay attention to the grammar.
MCBBSにようこそ、でも、文法に注意してください。
welcome to mcbbs,Hope you have a good time

replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
嘤语不错
Hello new entrant, welcome to MCBBS, a BBS which has clear and complete rules, enjoy yourself!

BTW, pay more attention to your EN grammar.
